Mod.Name: This is my mod name
Mod.ZipFileName: This is the name of my mods zip file (i.e. something.zip). If this ever changes, it will be considered a different mod regarding updates This must also be the name of this xml file
Mod.Description: This is a description of my mod, what it does, and any warnings or tips about it
Mod.Authors: These are the authors and contributors for this mod
Mod.Version: Increase this when you update your mod so it is auto-downloaded
Mod.ReleaseDate: Formatted exactly: dd/mm/yyyy including 0s where necessary
Mod.FileSize: Unzipped size of all your files so players can avoid large mods if they need to
